name: Submarine Escape
description:
The game is simple to learn. Press the DOWN key to move down and let go to move up. Don't touch any mines or the ground and don't let the torpedoes hit you!

It is my FIRST game and I used Bolt with Unity. All art is my own and some of it I even like. But I am on the look out for an artist to help bring it all together.

Any and all feedback welcome!
